resources.string: Application has been successfully granted usage stats permission.
Click to request usage stats permission. This permission is needed to begin background service. You only need to do this once.
You cannot change values until midnight.
Tap Start Service then follow instructions on website. If successfully set up, you will be to join experiment and your code will appear below.
Error submitting worker id. Contact researcher.
Are you sure you entered correct ID? This cannot be changed once submitted.
Goodvibe app helps you manage your digital consumption using techniques grounded in Behavioral Science.

This app saves your phone habits (apps used and screen events) in a secured server. All data will inform the design of effective behavioral techniques in the future. By using this app, you contribute to the advancement of scientific research on curbing technology overuse.
Goodvibe is designed by Small Data Lab at Cornell Tech, New York, USA. More info about the lab at https://smalldata.io
